about_the_game:
A game in the spirit of the old JRPGs with the following features:

The absence of a Grind.


There are no endless enemies in the game. All defeated opponents die forever. Yes, of course there are additional locations and opponents where you can upgrade your characters a little higher than required, but no more.

Difficulty.


The game involves the deliberate use of consumables and the distribution of commands during battles. Some bosses, and sometimes ordinary opponents, can cause difficulties when passing, but with an effort, players will be able to overcome any obstacles with confidence.

Leveling Up The Skills Of The Masters.


In the spirit of the good old RPG, you will receive SKILL POINTS for completing missions and killing bosses. These points can be exchanged from various masters for new skills (and not necessarily combat ones). For example, in the village you can find a lumberjack who will teach you how to chop firewood, or you can meet a burglar who, for a certain service, will show you a master class on hacking
detailed_description:
A game in the spirit of the old JRPGs with the following features:

The absence of a Grind.


There are no endless enemies in the game. All defeated opponents die forever. Yes, of course there are additional locations and opponents where you can upgrade your characters a little higher than required, but no more.

Difficulty.


The game involves the deliberate use of consumables and the distribution of commands during battles. Some bosses, and sometimes ordinary opponents, can cause difficulties when passing, but with an effort, players will be able to overcome any obstacles with confidence.

Leveling Up The Skills Of The Masters.


In the spirit of the good old RPG, you will receive SKILL POINTS for completing missions and killing bosses. These points can be exchanged from various masters for new skills (and not necessarily combat ones). For example, in the village you can find a lumberjack who will teach you how to chop firewood, or you can meet a burglar who, for a certain service, will show you a master class on hacking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50),

short_description: This fun jRPG will immerse you in a fantasy world. The game makes fun of the clichés of old jRPGs, essentially being a funny parody of the games of our childhood. Immerse yourself in complete absurd satire. Learn professions, hire mercenaries and perform feats as if you were a Hero (Probably).
